mapper.select: SELECT otb.exam_code, otb.name, otb.cls_name, otb.score, otb.objans, stb.subans FROM (SELECT paper.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, GROUP_CONCAT(oans.quesno, '-', oans.answer ORDER BY oans.quesno) AS objans FROM ustudy.paper LEFT JOIN obj_answer AS oans ON oans.paperid = paper.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code left join class on class.id = ee.class_id left join subscore on (subscore.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id and subscore.stuid = ee.id) LEFT JOIN question ON (question.exam_grade_sub_id = paper.exam_grade_sub_id AND oans.quesno >= question.startno AND question.endno >= oans.quesno) WHERE paper.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') GROUP BY paper.exam_code, ee.name, class.id, subscore.score ORDER BY class.id, paper.exam_code) otb LEFT JOIN (SELECT exam_code, name, GROUP_CONCAT(quesno, '-', score ORDER BY quesno) AS subans FROM ((SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, question.quesno, answer.score FROM ustudy.answer LEFT JOIN paper ON paper.id = paperid LEFT JOIN question ON answer.quesid = question.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code WHERE question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type NOT IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') AND question.quesno > 0 ORDER BY ee.exam_code , question.startno) UNION (SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, anst.quesno, anst.score FROM ustudy.answer LEFT JOIN paper ON paper.id = paperid LEFT JOIN question ON answer.quesid = question.id LEFT JOIN answer_step AS anst ON anst.answer_id = answer.id LEFT JOIN examinee AS ee ON ee.exam_code = paper.exam_code WHERE question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} AND question.type NOT IN ('单选题' , '多选题', '判断题') AND question.quesno = 0 ORDER BY ee.exam_code , question.startno , anst.quesno) ORDER BY exam_code , quesno) tb1 GROUP BY exam_code , name) stb ON otb.exam_code = stb.exam_code order by cls_name, exam_code

select otbl.rans, stbl.qscore, (otbl.fscore + stbl.fscore) as score from (SELECT group_concat(refanswer.quesno, '-', answer order by refanswer.quesno) as rans FROM ustudy.refanswer left join question on (question.exam_grade_sub_id = refanswer.exam_grade_sub_id and refanswer.quesid = question.id) where exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} order by quesid) otbl join (select group_concat(quesno, '-', score order by quesno) as qscore, sum(score) as fscore from ( SELECT question.quesno, question.score FROM ustudy.question where exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} and question.quesno > 0 and question.type not in ('单选题','多选题','判断题') union (select question_step.quesno, question_step.score from question_step left join question on question_step.quesid = question.id where question.exam_grade_sub_id = #{egsid} and question.quesno = 0 and question.type not in ('单选题','多选题','判断题'))) tb1) stbl

SELECT ee.exam_code, ee.name, class.cls_name, score, rank FROM examinee AS ee LEFT JOIN class ON class.id = ee.class_id LEFT JOIN subscore ON subscore.stuid = ee.id LEFT JOIN examgradesub AS egs ON (egs.examid = ee.examid AND egs.grade_id = ee.gradeid AND egs.id = subscore.exam_grade_sub_id) WHERE egs.id = #{egsid} ORDER BY rank
